Kauai Shores The Kaua'i Shores is situated on a secluded beach on Kauai's Royal Coconut Coast. The property features six beachfront acres of lush tropical lawns and gardens and two outdoor swimming pools. Contemporary accommodations feature sleek, retro-modern designs and vibrant island colours with private lanais offering beautiful mountain, garden, pool or ocean views. The hotel also features the Lava Lava Beach Club restaurant, the island's only Toes in the Sand dining experience.
